backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing scam report submission, retrieval, and statistics with custom ScamType ordering and report counting.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report placeholder containing a kind field and an empty features array.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing summarized descriptions of all major frontend components, pages, hooks, and scripts.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes and base styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file mounting the React app root and loading main.tsx.
frontend/scripts/EXPORT_ARTIFACT.md: Documentation describing the structure, format, and verification steps of the generated source code export archives.
frontend/scripts/export-source-code.ps1: PowerShell script that stages project files and creates a timestamped ZIP archive containing the full source code.
frontend/scripts/export-source-code.sh: Shell script that packages backend, frontend, and root config into a timestamped tar.gz archive.
frontend/SOURCE_CODE_EXPORT.md: Guide explaining prerequisites, export steps, local setup, running, structure, workflow, and troubleshooting for the project.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with all app routes and wraps them in the AppLayout component.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout component providing navigation, main content container, and footer with dynamic attribution link.
frontend/src/components/AppNav.tsx: Responsive navigation bar with active-route highlighting, desktop buttons, and mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/components/Branding.tsx: Logo and wordmark components displaying the DarkPattern Shield branding assets.
frontend/src/components/ReportsDashboard: Displays scam reporting statistics with loading and error states, showing total reports and most common scam type.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login/logout handling, and an AuthClient-backed context provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines react-query hooks to fetch stats and submit scam reports through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and base styling for the app.
frontend/src/lib/riskDetector.ts: Analyzes text for risk keywords and returns a Low/Medium/High risk assessment with detected terms.
frontend/src/lib/riskQuiz.ts: Contains quiz questions, scoring logic, and computes a risk awareness level based on user answers.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider and renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/BrowserExtensionConce: Renders a concept page describing a future browser extension with mockups and feature explanations.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with a hero section, dark-pattern awareness text, and CTA buttons linking to detector, report, and risk-test pages plus example dark pattern cards.
frontend/src/pages/PersonalDigitalRiskTe: Implements a multi‑question quiz that computes a vulnerability score and displays results with explanations and tips, including progress and retake logic.
frontend/src/pages/ScamReportingPage.tsx: Provides a form to submit scam reports with category selection, optional screenshot description, success/error alerts, and integration with a submit-report mutation.
frontend/src/pages/SubscriptionTrapDetec: Allows users to paste offer text and runs keyword‑based risk analysis, showing risk level, icons, and educational info about dark patterns.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, and plugins for container queries and animations.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s architecture, requirements, features, and current build state for the DarkPattern Shield app.
